name: outer_moons
title: Outer Moons
author: Amyzonis & Pieter
description: Adds a set of moons to explore. Nauvis' moon Selene, a cratered world with . Adds the gas giant Cronus as the hub for four major moons, sulfuric Mefitis, icy Aquilo, methane-blanketed Aiolos, and alien Feronia. Also adds a variety of new production chains, a bunch of changes to existing content, and advanced buildings that expand the Space Age experience.
